item.title: Prayer bpn12980 in Tok Pisin
item.description: ##TABLET OF VISITATION - ‘Abdul-Bahá’í *Dispela prea em wanpela prea ‘Abdul-Bahá’í Yet i raitim. Ol Bahá’í i save kolim dispela prea long ples matmat bilong ‘Abdul-Baha. Na tu ol i save kolim em bilong tingim ‘Abdul-Bahá’í. ‘AbdulBahá’í Yet i tok olsem: “Husat man i kolim strong dispela prea na daunim em yet, dispela man i amamasim tru bel bilong dispela wokman (‘Abdul-Bahá). I olsem dispela man i bung wantaim Em na lukim pes bilong Em.
